Tap here to show the drawer with preferences
Tap around any tweak name to get a short description

Some tweaks take time to activate. Always wait for the SU msg to disappear!
This is not a game. Use this app with your brain!
You didn\'t zipalign your app yet! Zipalign decreases the RAM usage of your apps. Tap here to begin!

This tool allows you to use the Android Tweaker 2 smart actions. Smart actions can be enabled through preferences panel (in app), a widget or the smart notification (activable in the smart actions preference). Smart actions allows you to setup custom behaviors when your device goes in standby. If, for example, you turn on the wifi smart action, wifi will be turned off, and back on, when the standby mode is inserted/removed. Currently there are 4 smart actions available: Wifi, Bluetooth, Data and Sync. These actions, will extend the battery life of your device up to 300%!

This addon allows you to change your system font with one tap. Choose between the 20+ proposed font and if you don\'t like the one you installed, simply tap on the reset button to restore your original one!
This addon allows you to create a custom notification with weather informations based on your GPS location or custom location.

Floating gestures allows you to create custom gestures and assign an action to them. The floating icon will open the gestures pad in which you can draw your custom gestures! check out the video for a preview!
This addon allows you to backup and restore your personal data such as short message, call logs, dictionaries, settings and more
This addon allows you to create a fully customizable like unity launcher with a swipe from outside the screen on the left or on the right side. Check out the video for a little preview

This addon allows you to create a fully customizable Mac OSX like exposè. This exposè allows you to setup custom actions when you tap the 4 corners of your device screen. Check out the video for a little preview

This addon allows you to securely store Documents, APKs, Music, Audio, Pictures, Videos, Personal notes, Bookmarks, Phone numbers etc. inside the chamber of secrets. A password is required to open the chamber and all the files are securely encrypted!
Please, buy a legit copy of this app. Developers put dedication and time on creating applications like that. You should support our work!!

Enable or disable Hardware Debug. Gives a little extra system performance
Enable or disable persistent sys UI HW. Gives a little extra system performance
Enable or disable debug performance tuning. Gives a little extra system performance
Enable or disable hardware video acceleration. Gives a little extra system performance
Enable or disable EGL HW debug. Gives a little extra system performance
Enable or disable EGL Profiler debug. Gives a little extra system performance
Increase or decrese min fling veocity. Gives a better scroll and smothness. We suggest to rise this to max
Increase or decrese max fling veocity. Gives a better scroll and smothness. We suggest to rise this to max
Enable or disable multitouch. This is not working on all devices. Gives extra system performance and decrease battery drain
Increase or decrease max events per second. Gives a better scroll and smothness. For low ram devices we suggest to put this to 150 or below.
Decrease pointer duration. Gives a better scroll and smothness
Change power collapse behavior. Helps to relieve pressur on CPU
Change sleep mode behavior. Helps to relieve CPU pressure during sleep
Decrease wifi scan interval and saves some battery
Enable or disable power supply. Helps to decrease battery drain
Enable or disable sensor sleep control. Helps to decrease battery drain

Enable or disable this tweak to increase the gprs network speed. Note: If you already see this tweak enabled, it means you don\'t need it
Enable or disable this tweak to increase the edge network speed. Note: If you already see this tweak enabled, it means you don\'t need it
Enable or disable this tweak to increase a bit your signal reception
Enable or disable this tweak to increase a bit your signal reception
Increase or decrease overall JPEG quality
Increase or decrease JPEG decoder memcap. Gives a little extra JPEG quality
Increase or decrease hprof video BPS. Gives a better video recording quality
Increase or decrease hprof video FPS. Gives a better video recording quality
Enable or disable panorama defres. Rise to the maximum panorama defres resolution
Enable or disable panorama frameres. Rise to the maximum panorama frame resolution
Enable or disable camcorder video mode. Gives a better video recording quality
Improve media streaming speed with some net/video tweaks
Collection of image quality tweaks. Gives a little extra images and videos quality at cost of less performances

Disable LogCat error reporting. Saves some battery and increase general performances
Disable Kernel error reporting. Saves some battery and increase general performances

Create a password that will allows you to open the chamber. Password will be stored in your phone with AES and SALT encryption. It\'s extremely important that you don\'t forget your password!

Important: If you uninstall Android Tweaker 2 or you wipe your data all the files inside the chamber will be deleted! You can use Android Tweaker 2 appmanager to backup/restore app data that will also works for chamber files!
Make sure you enter the same password in both fields
Password must contain at least 6 char!
All the notes created are encypted and stored into the app! No one except you can access to them

Allows you to play media files such as audio, images, docs, videos etc. The files needs to be moved out from the chamber and moved to original directory before get played. All the files will be automatically moved back once you close the chamber!
Tweaks collection for OOM and caching
Root access is required in order to tweak and restore your Android OS
Do you want to reset all tweaks?
OTA Tweaker is ready to tweak back your device

OTA Tweaker will tweak your device back if device receive OTA updates such as nightlies or new build. Keep in mind that this will not work if during update process the data will be wiped!\n\nNote: if you already tweaked your device with Android Tweaker 2, you should tweak it again to store the new tweaks into the OTA tweaker!
Allows you to flash zip files. A custom recovery is required in order to flash zip files on your device!
